name: Villain (Bonus Track)
content: I'm so cold and far away from home
I'm so tired and so damn alone
So far away from my reality
I think maybe I'm just falling
And you watch me fight my own insanity
Said would never ever leave us
I think maybe I'm just falling
And you watch me fight my own insanity
Said would never ever leave us
And you watch me fight my own insanity
Said would never ever leave us
Said would never ever leave us
